item.title: Escaping from the Asian Civilisations Museum: A Great Adventure
item.description:
Singapore’s Asian Civilisations Museum is hosting “Night at the Museum: The Great Escape from Asian Civilisations Museum,” featuring two evenings of movies and interactive games. This event, possibly the first of its kind globally, is designed as a museum-wide escape room. Participants will solve puzzles, uncover museum secrets, and decipher the meanings behind ancient artifacts to “escape.” Winners have a chance to win movie tickets to Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/escaping-from-the-asian-civilisations-museum-a-great-adventure/

item.title: ANA has developed an app to assist passengers in relaxing and diverting their attention away from takeoff
item.description:
Source: App Store. All Nippon Airways (ANA), a major Japanese airline, developed an app to alleviate stress during the most anxiety-inducing part of air travel. Based on a survey of US airline passengers revealing that takeoff causes the most anxiety (68%), ANA created “ANA Takeoff Mode.” This mobile app aims to help travelers relax and focus on something other than takeoff. The app presents a simple puzzle accompanied by calming music...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ana-has-developed-an-app-to-assist-passengers-in-relaxing-and-diverting-their-attention-away-from-takeoff/

item.title: There is a growing trend of adults purchasing toys and games
item.description:
In 2016, games and puzzles experienced an 8% surge in the global market, surpassing construction toys as the fastest-growing toy category, according to Euromonitor International, a global market research firm. This impressive growth also marks the highest for the category since 2002. Although construction toys saw a growth of 7.8% in 2016, a dip compared to the double-digit growth of 2015, they still dominated the traditional toys and games market with a value of US$10 billion...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/there-is-a-growing-trend-of-adults-purchasing-toys-and-games/
